hackathon-description-text: SteelHacks is an event hosted at the University of Pittsburgh, through the School of Computing and Information, for students at colleges & universities across the US who are passionate about getting their hands dirty using technology and design.
hackathon-eligibility: Any undergraduate or graduate student who signed up at
